## Participants needed! {.smaller}

**Topic:** We are currently recruiting participants for a study on decision-making. 

**Location:** This study takes place on campus in the Psychology Department at Teesside University.

**What is involved?** This is a lab study which involves several cognitive tasks which test attention, memory and decision-making. Participants will also complete a brief questionnaire.

**Duration:** The study will take approximately 20 minutes to complete.

<img src="../images/study_qr.png" width="150  "> <br />

**Contact:** If you are interested in taking part, please scan the QR code, click the link below to sign up for a time slot or email [christopher.wilson@tees.ac.uk](mailto:christopher.wilson@tees.ac.uk?subject=Research%20Participation&body=I%20would%20like%20to%20take%20part%20in%20your%20research%20study.).
